snippet: The company reported higher earnings and revenue in the third quarter.
abstract: EBay forecasts fourth-quarter revenue of $4.5 billion to $4.6 billion, compared with $4.64 billion forecast by analysts; reports third-quarter profit of $689 million, or 53 cents a share, up 15.4 percent from $597 million, or 45 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 14.3 percent to $3.89 billion.
lead_paragraph: The company reported higher earnings and revenue in the third quarter.

headline.main: Profit Rises for eBay, but Outlook Disappoints
headline.print_headline: Profit Rises For eBay, But Outlook Disappoints
